model

Class Road

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Road
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Agent, CarAcceptor

    public class Road
extends java.lang.Object
implements CarAcceptor, Agent
    A road holds cars. when it is run, it runs all the Car Objects it is holding and then re-enqueues itself.
